column4: I got the driver installed last time before my disks crashed and I had to reinstall the whole system
If you are using a Linux 2.6 kernel, please make sure
you have configured kernel sources matching your kernel
installed on your system. If you specified a separate
output directory using either the "KBUILD_OUTPUT" or
the "O" KBUILD parameter, make sure to specify this
directory with the SYSOUT environment variable or with
the appropriate nvidia-installer command line option.
it takes 5 secs to install 2.6.10 why not just do it for simplicity's sake?
well nvidia driver expects the kernel to be installed to /usr/src/linux
the source is there, same with the symlink
do you have your .config file in there?
do you have your .config file in there?
